item.title: Why Did I Start to Invest in The Stock Market?
item.description: Most of you perhaps ever heard or read about The Cashflow Quadrant by Robert Kiyosaki. I bought his book when I was a high school student. The book explained about quadrant of economic roles: employee, self-employed, business owner, and investor. The employee is people who have a job, I was. The self-employed is individuals who own a job, I was. The business owner is individuals who have a system that produces cash flow for themselves and other work for them; this is me now.
